channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Coffee & Conversations | June 26
item.description: Date: Thursday, June 26, 2025 11:00 AM - 1:00 PM - Students are invited to stop by for a cup of coffee, a little treat and an opportunity to socially connect with peers!
item.author: Community

item.title: Graduate Certificates Review with Rensselaer at Work | June 26
item.description: Date: Thursday, June 26, 2025 12:00 PM - 12:30 PM - Join Rensselaer at Work Dean Aric Krause, Ph.D., in a 30-minute information session highlighting the whole range of Rensselaerâ€™s online, project-based graduate certificate programs. These certificates are three courses in length, developing targeted ability groups, and can be completed in as little as seven months. Please click the link to complete the form if you plan to attend.
item.author: Community

item.title: ECAV Weight Room
item.description:
Date: Monday, June 23, 2025 11:00 AM - The ECAV Weight Room is open to all students, faculty, and staff. Mondays -Thursdays 11:00AM - 7:00PM. Fridays 12:00PM - 5:00PM. CLOSED ON WEEKENDS.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
item.author: Community
